subject: p18828251
Findings: AP and lateral chest radiographs were obtained. The lungs are well expanded and the central pulmonary vasculature is more indistinct. Cephalization of the upper lobe pulmonary vasculature has progressed since. Small bilateral pleural effusions are new. Moderate cardiomegaly is unchanged. Sternotomy wires and vascular clips are in unchanged positions.
Impression: Indistinct pulmonary vasculature and small pleural effusions are consistent with worsening of mild CHF since .
